title: Tea & Bee's Milk: Our Year In A Turkish Village
description: Tea & Bee's Milk makes understanding another culture as simple as pouring a cup of tea. And it does so with gentle humor, curiosity, and a cheerful affection for the Turkish people. If you've ever dreamed of ditching the rat race and taking a year off, this happy memoir will encourage you to pack your bags and go.
author: Karen Gilden
